Reference genomes

Source: vignettes/genomes.Rmd
genomes.Rmd

Various references are used throughout the project:

GENCODEr40

This February 2019 human genome build (GRCh38.p13) is paired with GENCODE annotation Release 40/Ensembl release 106, published April 2022. Both were downloaded from Gencode in May 2022.

GENCODEm28_HLT

This June 2020 mouse genome build (GRCm39) is paired with GENCODE annotation M28/Ensembl release 105, published Dec 2021. Both were downloaded from Gencode in Jan 2022.

GRCm38_HLT

GRCm38_HLT is equivalent to the venerable mm10 mouse reference genome (GRCm38), used for the Cancer Research and Science Advances papers. The assembly was originally released in January 2012 and is no longer updated; it is annotated with Ensembl release 81, published July 2015. The version used here was downloaded from Illumina’s iGenomes in 2017.

Additional human leukemic transgenes (“HLT”)

Additional human leukemic transgenes are concatenated to genome fasta files and included in the indexes used by STAR and Salmon.

chr name accession description
HSA_MYH11 NM_002474.3 Homo sapiens myosin heavy chain 11 (MYH11), transcript variant SM1A, mRNA
HSA_BCR_ABL1 EF158045.1 Homo sapiens BCR/ABL p210 fusion protein (BCR/ABL fusion) mRNA, partial cds
HSA_BCR NM_004327.4 Homo sapiens BCR activator of RhoGEF and GTPase (BCR), transcript variant 1, mRNA
HSA_ABL1 NM_005157.6 Homo sapiens ABL proto-oncogene 1, non-receptor tyrosine kinase (ABL1), transcript variant a, mRNA

Availability

Genome reference files (fasta, gtf, star, salmon) are located on the Isilon store, and can be accessed via the HPC at

  • /ref_genome/igenomes/Homo_sapiens/GENCODE/Release40
  • /ref_genome/igenomes/Mus_musculus/Ensembl/GRCm38_human_leukemic_transgenes
  • /ref_genome/igenomes/Mus_musculus/GENCODE/ReleaseM28_HLT
